item.title: SpringBoot Jpa @OneByOne双向查询报栈溢出原因
item.description: 示例： @Data @Entity public class User { @Id @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY) private Integer uid; /**用户名*/ private String username; /**用户密码*/ private String password; /**注册时间*/ private Timestamp regTime; /**性别*/ private Boolean sex; @OneToOne(cascade = CascadeType.ALL) @JoinColumn(name = "weixin") private WXToken wxToken; } @Data @Entity public class WXToken { /**微信号*/ @Id private String weixin; /**微信token授
